column1: == History ==

column2: the city was founded by a "crooked" (Ukrainian slang for one-eyed) Cossack named Rih. But
column3: records pre-dating the founding of the city refer to the area by the same name. It appears based on the shape of the landmass formed by the confluence of the river Saksahan with the Inhulets.
